title: TIC TECH TOE
shortDescription:
A beginner-friendly workshop on Generative AI focusing on Google Gemini.
Covering backend architecture, multimodal capabilities, and API integration through hands-on demos.
fullDescription: A beginner-friendly workshop on Generative AI focusing on Google Gemini, covering its backend architecture, multimodal capabilities, and API integration through hands-on demos. The event was free of cost, and all participants received e-certificates.

title: Speaking Session on Communication Skills
shortDescription:
An interactive speaking session by HWI and its 6 chapters.
Focused on improving communication skills, confidence, and public speaking.
fullDescription: An interactive speaking session by HWI and its 6 chapters focused on improving communication skills, confidence, and public speaking. This workshop helps participants develop better presentation skills and overcome stage fright.

title: TechVerse
shortDescription:
A technical speaking session focused on Cybersecurity and AI in digital safety.
Features hands-on tasks, prizes for top performers, and e-certificates for all participants.
fullDescription: A technical speaking session by HWI – IPEC Student Chapter focused on Cybersecurity and the role of AI in digital safety, featuring hands-on tasks, prizes for top performers, and e-certificates for all participants.

title: HACKMART
shortDescription:
An AI-focused hackathon with ₹15,000 prize pool organized by Think AI Club.
Features trophies for top teams and certificates for all participants.
fullDescription: An AI-focused hackathon organized by with Hack With India in collaboration Think AI Club to promote innovation and AI-driven product development, featuring a ₹15,000 prize pool, trophies for top teams, and certificates for all participants.
